name: Legend of Marrow
description:
Story

  • Marrow found herself in a heavily rainy place, the droplets pounding against her skin like a relentless drumbeat. She had been drawn here by a mysterious force, one that she couldn't quite explain. All she knew was that she had to be here, in this place of darkness and wetness.

  • As she made her way deeper into the rain-soaked forest, Marrow encountered a series of obstacles and puzzles that challenged her both physically and mentally. She had to navigate through treacherous terrain, avoiding slippery rocks and jagged roots that threatened to trip her up at every turn. She had to solve riddles and puzzles that were carved into the bark of the trees, their answers hidden in the intricate patterns of the trees and branches that covered them.

  • Despite the challenges, Marrow refused to give up. She had a sense of purpose, a sense of determination that she had never felt before. She knew that she was on a mission, one that was vital to her very existence.

  • What lay at the end of the path, Marrow had no idea. But she knew that she had to find out. She had to know what lay at the heart of this place, and what it was that had brought her here.

Hero Definition

  • Marrow encounters a series of obstacles and puzzles that challenges through her journey both physically and mentally.

Key Features!

  • Chapters: Upon discovering the story, revisit the old places and collect any missable items.
  • Collectibles: A rewarding collectible system: gather a collection and be rewarded.
  • Documents: The historical people who wrote them will guide you through your journey.
  • Exploration: An abandoned, dark town filled with obstacles, puzzles, and danger.
  • Flashlight: Be aware of the battery amounts, or you won’t be able to see some places!
  • Inventory: You'll be short on the available slots; find a way to extend them.
  • Mystery: Discover the dark, mysterious events in the story.
  • Puzzles: Focus on the things you collect and the things you see to solve the puzzles!
  • Rain: Don’t let your guard down in the biting cold rain.
